Author: serpent__
Text: It's like drugs, you just do it to cope and as an escape. It provides a release/euphoria. The sequence of behaviours, thoughts and compulsions.   The downs you get from an ED is like what happens when you binge, gain weight, anything negative occurring as a result of the behaviours that usually give you a high and sense of elation  Heart palpitations are distressing. You could manage it by cutting back on caffeine/replace with decaf, switching to passive exercise and minimising your stress levels  Also any supplements like magnesium and potassium. I developed a THC addiction/dependency years ago to block out all of the stuff going on in my head that fuelled my ED. It backfires having one issue on top of another
